rules_text:
[i](As an Arena enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it converted for free.)[/i]
Whenever one or more defense counters are removed from this battle, each player that attacked this turn creates that many Treasure tokens.
rules_text2: At the beginning of your combat, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste.
notes: Whenever a player not protecting this battle attacks, they may put a creature card from their hand into play tapped and attacking this battle. If they do, they return that creature to their hand at the beginning of the next end step.
